settings.title: Copyrighted LLMs Will DOMINATE The Internet!
settings.subtitle: Authors Of Many Subjects Will Benefit: Political And Social Analysis, Any Alternative Non-Mainstream Theories, Textbooks And Academic Resources, Historical Documentaries And Memoirs, Alternative Medicine And Health, And Many More.

settings.brand_line_one: Built With AI For The 22nd Century

settings.problem_text: Pharma dominates health discussions and has captured all government agencies and the media
Consumers get “plain vanilla” answers from LLMs because copyrighted information is left out.
Authors have a hard time promoting their books.
Influencers can’t use standard LLMs to write blogs!

settings.main_title: The best way for consumers to quickly understand authors and influencers is to get instant answers from LLMs specialized in their subject matters. Our company, New Century Press (NCP) aims to bridge the gap between authors and their fans while also promoting their books.
settings.solution_text: We offer authors and influencers to upload their books into our specialized LLMs. We make it easy for authors and influencers to create and publish content Consumers can access LLMs that include authors books and will be given a link to purchase books. Consumers of Non-Fiction get what they want and authors get more sales and advertising!

settings.question: 1. Do you sell zappers or Syncrometers®?
